channel.title: Paying For Pro Coders!
channel.description:
Hello guys, and today I`m here to say that I need some server help. I have been coding this server and I can say I have been doing good for 1 person coding, but now I have found some stuff i cannot do. Now I need some coding help, and i will pay in paypal cash. Ill make a list of what i need done at the bottom.
1. Bosses need To be Stronger 2. Safe spots at the bosses need fixed 3. Need a pkpoint shop and point system 4. Drops need to be fixed
if anyone can fix these, message me on here or to get a quicker response, add me on skype - RsPsVeTeRaN

item.title: Paying For Pro Coders!
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

Free is help in the Mopar community. So I won’t be surprised if this gets locked.

Post in the Development Teams forum and see if you can get a programmer to join your team and help you out.

Read full topic

item.title: Paying For Pro Coders!
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

Why pay for this easy stuff… And this is the help section btw …
What source are you using? PI?

Read full topic
